name: Age Group wise Assets
query:
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, a.purchase_date, CURDATE()) < 1 THEN '< 1 Year'
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, a.purchase_date, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN '1–3 Years'
        ELSE '> 3 Years'
    END AS `Age Bracket`,
    COUNT(*) AS `Asset Count`
FROM
    `tabAsset` a
WHERE
    a.docstatus = 1
    AND a.purchase_date IS NOT NULL
    AND a.company = %(company)s
    AND a.location = %(location)s
GROUP BY
    `Age Bracket`
ORDER BY
    FIELD(`Age Bracket`, '< 1 Year', '1–3 Years', '> 3 Years');
